items.name: Fresh Spinach and Bell Pepper Wrap
instructions: Step 1: Spread Philadelphia cream cheese on the flour tortillas.
Step 2: Thinly slice red cabbage, carrots, bell peppers, and tomatoes.
Step 3: Layer spinach leaves, sliced vegetables, and sunflower seeds onto the tortillas.
Step 4: Roll up the tortillas tightly and slice into halves.
Step 5: Serve fresh and enjoy your wrap!

items.name: Sweet and Savory Spinach Salad
instructions: Step 1: In a large bowl, combine fresh spinach leaves and chopped mint.
Step 2: Add sliced apples and orange bell pepper for sweetness.
Step 3: Sprinkle a handful of almonds and sunflower seeds for crunch.
Step 4: Prepare the dressing by mixing maple syrup and Annie's mustard.
Step 5: Toss the salad with dressing and top with Durkee French onions.

items.name: Fruity Cream Cheese Stuffed Pancakes
instructions: Step 1: In a bowl, mash bananas and mix with Philadelphia cream cheese.
Step 2: On a preheated griddle, pour small amounts of strawberry syrup.
Step 3: Cook until bubble form and lightly browned underneath.
Step 4: Spoon the cream cheese mixture and place in center of pancakes.
Step 5: Fold pancakes and serve with a side of pickles for a unique contrast.

items.name: Creamy Tomato Egg Bake
instructions: Step 1: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Step 2: In a baking dish, layer sliced tomatoes over Philadelphia cream cheese.
Step 3: Crack eggs over tomatoes and spread almonds over the top.
Step 4: Bake for 20-25 minutes until eggs are set.
Step 5: Serve warm with a garnish of sliced pickles.

items.name: North African Spiced Roasted Vegetables
instructions: Step 1: Preheat oven to 400°F (204°C).
Step 2: Chop carrots, yellow bell pepper, and red cabbage into bite-sized pieces.
Step 3: Toss vegetables with olive oil, and spices (cumin, paprika, coriander if available).
Step 4: Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 25-30 minutes.
Step 5: Serve roasted veggies with chopped dates and cilantro on top.

analysis.recipe_name: Fresh Spinach and Bell Pepper Wrap
